channel.title: Fixed on Gyuri Im
channel.description: Recent content in Fixed on Gyuri Im

item.title: about
item.description: My name is Gyuri. This is my blog where I write about technology, among other things. I worked in several startups, some of which have been acquired or IPO’ed. I created a photo app, which you can checkout if you have an iPhone. Currently I am a cofounder of MARS, developing self-driving technology. I studied Computer Science at KAIST. You can contact me at gyuri at marsauto.io Open Source europilot: A toolkit for controlling Euro Truck Simulator 2 with python to develop self-driving algorithms.
